name: Sjors Provoost
cooked: Thinking about it a bit more, it seems you can’t actually do what I’m describing here with CTV and it only works with CCV. In particular a descriptor can’t and shouldn’t commit to the amount that is sent to it, because the receiver doesn’t have control over that.
raw: Thinking about it a bit more, it seems you can't actually do what I'm describing here with CTV and it only works with CCV. In particular a descriptor can't and shouldn't commit to the _amount_ that is sent to it, because the receiver doesn't have control over that.
